mapper.insert: insert into dope_manage (id, tzxt, tzzh, tzje, tzfx, tzsj_section1, tzsj_section2, table_no, is_delete, create_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tzxt}, #{tzzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tzje,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tzfx}, #{tzsjSection1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tzsjSection2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tableNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 0, now())

insert into dope_manage (tzxt, tzzh, tzje, tzfx, tzsj_section1, tzsj_section2, table_no, is_delete, create_time) values
(#{item.tzxt}, #{item.tzzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.tzje,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.tzfx}, #{item.tzsjSection1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.tzsjSection2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.tableNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 0, now())
mapper.update: update dope_manage set tzzh = #{tzzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tzje = #{tzje,jdbcType=INTEGER}, tzsj_section1 = #{tzsjSection1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tzsj_section2 = #{tzsjSection2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, table_no = #{tableNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tzfx = #{tzfx}, 0, now() where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, tzxt, tzzh, tzje, tzfx, tzsj_section1, tzsj_section2, table_no, is_delete, create_time from dope_manage

SELECT a.id, a.tzxt, a.tzzh, b.`name`, b.account, a.tzje, a.tzfx, a.tzsj_section1, a.tzsj_section2, a.table_no, a.is_delete, a.create_time FROM dope_manage a, user_account b WHERE a.tzzh = b.id AND a.tzxt = #{tzxt} ORDER BY b.account ASC
SELECT id FROM dope_manage WHERE tzzh = #{tzzh}
select id, tzxt, tzzh, tzje, tzfx, tzsj_section1, tzsj_section2, table_no, is_delete, create_time from dope_manage WHERE is_delete = 0 AND table_no LIKE concat('%',#{tableNo},'%') AND tzxt = #{tzxt}
